posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start 33:59:16 【Udemy付费课程】iOS13 & Swift - The Complete iOS App Development Bootcamp-->中英文字幕（P1） 1.3万 110 视频 疯狂滴小黑 .bbplayer{width: 100%; max-width: 850px; margin: auto} document.getElementById("mmedia-KreiCCdOrHVICOss").style.height=document.getElementById("mmedia-KreiCCdOrHVICOss").scrollWidth*0.76+"px"; window.onresize = function(){ document.getElementById("mmedia-KreiCCdOrHVICOss").style.height=document.getElementById("mmedia-KreiCCdOrHVICOss").scrollWidth*0.76+"px"; }; Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
